value: 24 Hr Reminder - Waiting to hear back...

Hi {{ticket.requester.first_name}}- 

We haven't heard a reply back from you in 24 hours. For now, we're placing this ticket to Solved status. If you still have questions, you may reply back to to this email and it will reopen the ticket. 

Thank you,
{{current_user.first_name}}
A request for {{ticket.id}} was submitted 2 weeks ago. Can you please review?

add_automations.title: Add No_email_notifications tag after 5 hours of ticket being created

actions.value:
Su solicitud se ha enviado a su gerente para su aprobación. Recibirá una notificación automática tan pronto como se apruebe.


Gracias,

{{current_user.name}}‍

Hi {{ticket.requester.first_name}} ‍,


Thanks for reaching out.


Have you seen our newest 401K Guide for 2021 (attached)? A lot of details are in there about your available options, and I think you'll find the answers you'll need inside. Additionally, I'm happy to clarify anything specific for you. Please let me know!


Best,

{{ticket.assignee.first_name}}‍

Hi {{ticket.requester.first_name}}‍,


Thanks for reaching out.


We've got all the information you need on enrolling in your benefits program on our Help Center. Please visit the Benefits section for how to get started enrolling as a new employee in our plan.


We're here if you have additional questions!


Best,


{{ticket.assignee.name}}‍

Hi {{ticket.requester.first_name}}‍,


Thanks for reaching out.


We've got all the information you need on rolling over your 401K on our Help Center. Please visit the Benefits section for how to get started enrolling as a new employee in our plan.


We're here if you have additional questions!


Best,


{{ticket.assignee.name}}‍

Hi {{ticket.requester.first_name}}‍,


I understand you want to opt out of the ESPP program.


Please follow the instructions in our Help Center article, Cancel ESPP, to do so.


We are here if you have any specific questions about this procedure.


Best,


{{ticket.assignee.name}}‍

Hi {{ticket.requester.first_name}}‍,


Thanks for reaching out.


We've got all the information you need on enrolling in our ESPP program on our Help Center. Please visit the Benefits section to get started.


You will need to open an account with Michael Schwab, and FAQs on that process are answered here. For reference, your employee ID is 4242.


Thank you,

{{ticket.assignee.first_name}}

Hi {{ticket.requester.first_name}}‍,


Thanks for reaching out.


Please visit the Benefits section of our Help Center for step by step instructions on logging into your Michael Schwab account to make changes to your ESPP plan.


We are here to answer any specific questions you may have about that procedure!


Thank you,

{{ticket.assignee.first_name}}

Hi {{ticket.requester.first_name}}‍,


Thanks for reaching out.


We are escalating this to Payroll so that they can better investigate this issue. Hang tight.


We're here if you have additional questions!


Best,


{{ticket.assignee.name}}‍

Hi {{ticket.requester.first_name}}


We confirm we've received and logged your PTO request.


We wish you a great time off!


{{ticket.group.name}}‍

Hi {{ticket.requester.first_name}}


We confirm we've received and logged your request for PTO. As you have no more leave left on your accrual plan, we cannot approve this request.


We have assigned this request to your manager - In the case that they approve it, we will follow up with you.


Please let us know if you have any additional questions,


{{ticket.account}}

Hi {{ticket.requester.first_name}},


I can help you with your question about your PTO hours!


It looks like you have _ hours left for vacation, and _ left for sick time.


I'm going to go ahead and close out this ticket but you can respond if you have any other questions!

Hi {{ticket.requester.first_name}}‍,


We've received your PTO request and have routed to your manager for approval. You will receive an automated notification as soon as it's approved.


Thanks,

{{ticket.assignee.name}}‍

Prezado(a), {{ticket.requester.name}}‍


Sua solicitação de férias foi recebida em breve retornaremos com a conclusão da solicitação.



Atenciosamente,

{{current_user.first_name}}‍

Recursos Humanos

precisa.

value:
Thank you for your message {{ticket.requester.first_name}},

To reset your password, go to the login screen and click "Reset my password". 
--- Enter the email address you used when you made your MyPortal™.
--- Enter the characters you see on the screen (this lets us know you’re not a robot), then click Next.
(see screenshot below)

If you've added security info to your account, we'll send a one-time code to the alternate phone number or email address you gave us. After you enter that code on the next screen, you'll be able to make a new password.

Thanks {{ticket.requester.first_name}}! Please let us know if we can answer any further questions. 

- {{ticket.assignee.first_name}} 

![sample screenshot](https://p5.zdassets.com/hc/theme_assets/1219402/200369127/reset-password.jpg)

actions.value:
Gracias por su mensaje {{ticket.requester.first_name}},

Para restablecer su contraseña, vaya a la pantalla de inicio de sesión y haga clic en "Restablecer mi contraseña".
--- Ingrese la dirección de correo electrónico que utilizó cuando creó su MyPortal ™.
--- Ingrese los caracteres que ve en la pantalla (esto nos deja saber que no es un robot), luego haga clic en Siguiente.
(ver la captura de pantalla a continuación)

Si ha agregado información de seguridad a su cuenta, le enviaremos un código de una sola vez al número de teléfono alternativo o a la dirección de correo electrónico que nos haya proporcionado. Después de ingresar ese código en la pantalla siguiente, podrá crear una nueva contraseña.

¡Gracias {{ticket.requester.first_name}}! Por favor, háganos saber si podemos responder cualquier otra pregunta.

- {{ticket.assignee.first_name}}

! [muestra de captura de pantalla] (https://p5.zdassets.com/hc/theme_assets/1219402/200369127/reset-password.jpg)

Gracias por su mensaje {{ticket.requester.first_name}},

Volveremos en breve.

¡Gracias {{ticket.requester.first_name}}! Por favor, háganos saber si podemos responder cualquier otra pregunta.

- {{ticket.assignee.first_name}}

We'll get back to shortly. 

Thanks {{ticket.requester.first_name}}! Please let us know if we can answer any further questions. 

- {{ticket.assignee.first_name}}

actions.value:
Hi there,


We know your first few days can be overwhelming, so don't fret. This is totally normal.


Our team, as well as your manager, will be walking you through the onboarding process slowly.


Breathe, relax - we are thrilled you are here!


Sincerely,

People Ops

Hi there,

We know your first few days can be overwhelming, so don't fret. This is totally normal.

Our team, as well as your manager, will be walking you through the onboarding process slowly.

Breathe, relax - we are thrilled you are here!

Sincerely,

People Ops

Dear {{ticket.requester.name}},


I am pleased to confirm that we have completed the process of setting up your new team member with a new laptop and access to their company email account.


Please let us know if you have any questions.


Best Regards,


Your Friendly HR Team

Hi {{ticket.requester.first_name}},


The procedure to submit a new vendor for compliance review can be found on our help center. Please expect at least 4 days for internal review of your submission, and the team will send confirmation and further details from there.


Best,

Estimado {{ticket.requester.name}},


Me complace confirmar que hemos completado el proceso de configuración de el nuevo miembro de su equipo con una nueva laptop y acceso a una cuenta de correo electrónico corporativa.


Por favor, háganos saber si tiene alguna pregunta.


Atentamente,


Su amigable equipo de recursos humanos

Hola {{ticket.requester.name}}


Para tramitar tu tarjeta de estacionamiento por favor acude al sótano 1 de nuestro edificio, y proporciona la siguiente información en la oficina donde está la caja:


1. Copia de tu tarjeta de circulación

2. Copia de tu licencia de manejo vigente

3. Mostrar la credencial de empleado


Te entregarán un número de folio con el que podrás hacer seguimiento al proceso de entrega, así como una fecha aproximada para que puedas pasar a recogerla.


Por favor envíanos una notificación a través de este correo cuando la hayas recibido .


saludos y buen día.


{{ticket.assignee.first_name}}

add_macros.title: Preguntas de Estacionamiento::Oficina CDMX::Tarjeta de Estacionamiento

actions.value:
Hola {{ticket.requester.name}}:


Para tramitar tu tarjeta de estacionamiento por favor acude al sótano 1 de nuestro edificio, y proporciona la siguiente información en la oficina donde está la caja.

1. Copia de tu tarjeta de circulación

2. Copia de tu licencia de manejo vigente

3. Mostrar la credencial de empleado


Te entregarán un número de folio con el que podrás hacer seguimiento al proceso de entrega, así como una fecha aproximada para que puedas pasar a recogerla.


Por favor envíanos una notificación a través de este correo cuando la hayas recibido .


saludos y buen día.


{{current_user.name}}

Hello {{ticket.requester.name}}​ .name}}​


We are pleased to inform that your issue has been fixed.



Thank you,

{{ticket.assignee.name}}​
